page.title: 16A Typical Day
page.content: I got up at 7.45a.m. After breakfast I came to school on my bike at 8.30a.m.At 9.00a.m.I went into school assembly.After register we had mental and sums.During first playtime at 10.40.a.m.children bought crisps costing 13p a packet.Then we did English and handwriting and I got a team point. Dinner time play began at 12.00.We had our dinner at 12.30p.m.In the afternoon we had singing,then planted peas ,runner beans and nasturtuims. At 3.45p.m.we went home. I watched the football match England v Rumania, it was a draw.I had vegetable soup for tea.Then I went out to play with Richard, Malcolm, Leigh, David and Ben.We played blocky round the doctor's surgery.I came in for my supper and went to bed at 8.45p.m.
